[{"id":"dev-17025","entityId":"86-22243","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Gift certificate ] Voucher can be redeemed by changing ID in URL"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1575300080102"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17025"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/thisiswherewehaveanissue
Product ID103XX
Account emailreservation@supplierdomain.com
Supplier ID92XX
Order #19939XXXXX
Novomind Ticket ID293XX
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Login to staging environment (demoaccount@regiondo.de)
  2. Book gift certificate Booking number 1575299716019010800
  3. Redeem Gift certificate (RGVRKETDBPI)

4- After redeeming gift voucher , customer is redirected to success page

5- change URL from https://regiondo-demo-account.regiondo-dev-de.de/voucher/redeem/success/id/21335 to https://regiondo-demo-account.regiondo-dev-de.de/voucher/redeem/success/id/21305

Actual result:

After changing the URL, Im able to redeem ticket for other customers

Expected result:

redeeming others ticket by changing Url should not be possible

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1575971858710,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-15988","entityId":"86-18319","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Bundle] Add Gift certificate module for Bundle"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1543843645434"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15988"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://regiondo-demo-account-muenchen.regiondo.fr/packs-promo
Product ID56647
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de
Supplier ID9357
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Step to reproduce:

1- Go to Dashboard » Manage Offers » My Offer Bundles
2- Preview offer ID 56647

Actual result:

We can't buy gift certificate for bundle activities

Expected result:

  • FRONT END

1- Add Gift voucher module to bundle offers

1- A : 1 gift certificate code should be valid of all bundle activities.

1- B :Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :

  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people

2- After buying gift voucher for bundle offer, Customer should be able to redeem his voucher in the normal redeeming link and in POS

2- A : Redeeming voucher template, should propose
Font end :
Back end :

2- B- Show Custom order option if the Redeeming voucher template if bundle offer require one

2- C : if there is no availabilities , show supplier information (Company name , phone , Email address)

Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact %s company name :
%s phone
%s Email address

Wording
EN : Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact the supplier
FR : Malheureusement il n'y a pas de rendez-vous disponible, nous vous invitons de contacter le prestataire
DE : Leider ist kein Termin verfügbar, wir laden Sie ein, sich mit dem anbieter in Verbindung zu setzen:

  • POS

3- Ability to buy Gift voucher in POS

3- A- Display bundle Offer when we select Gift certificate

3- B - Same logic as in Front- end should be applied in POS

  • 1 code valid for all bundle activities.
  • Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :
  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people
  1. Availability of bundle voucher should be taken from Dashboard » Manage Offers » Ticket validity

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1575620864911,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64220","author":"alexander.bechte","authorFullName":"Alexander Bechte","issueId":"dev-15988","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei @Walid Dechri

Out solution for displaying the tickets after redeeming a bundle gift certificate:

Case: We have a Bundle with includes 4 offers and 3 attendees

1. ONE Gift certificate valid for X people
1.1 The user buys the ONE gift certificate for 3 people
1.2 The user redeems the gift certificate
= The user receive 4 PDF for each offer included in the bundle

Why: We can keep the structure which we already have for gift vouchers which include several attendee.

2. 3 Single gift certificates
1.1 The user buys 3 gift certificates for the 3 people
1.2 The user redeems the gift certificates
= The user receive 12 PDF = for each offer and attendee (3*4)

We only create one barcode - not for each offer included in the bundle.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1575642995156,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}]
